title: Do bronze/silvers have fun playing the game?
body:
Like objectively you guys are bad. Even low gold players objectively do not have a basic sense of the game. Do you guys have fun playing? 

Not to mention silver players get so toxic when you throw one critique at them like damn lol

Putting aside your obviously condescending tone, and the feeling that you sound like a mid 19th century upper-class man, yes, we do have fun down here in bronze. Right now the game is rather snowbally, but other than that the game is still very fun. 
Have a nice day ya "objective" prick
